title: Bring-a-mate

embed.description: "One of the most refreshing strategy games in years."

body:
Since i'm a bitch who wants Medival Twitch, click on the link and add me as a friend.


"OMG, it's the guy who posted on Boards"

replies.body: Do they give the skin to people who ask now? A lot of people don't have that many friends who want to play league.
Not sure if that rhyme was intended or not :^) Would have been so much better if riot made this just a little earlier since I have already gotten all my friends into league now anyways.
